bibl.title: Letter from Edward Anderson Alderman to Jefferson Randolph Kean, April 2, 1925

div1.p: Alderman, the President of the University of Virginia, congratulates Kean on his review of the Gorgas biography.

div1.head: Letter from Edward Anderson Alderman to Jefferson Randolph Kean, April 2, 1925
div1.opener:
UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA
CHARLOTTESVILLE
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
April 2nd, 1925.
General J. R. Kean,
The War Department,
Washington, D. C.
My dear General Kean:
div1.p:
I want to thank you warmly
for sending me the editorial on William Crawford
Gorgas, reprinted from “The Military Surgeon”
for March, 1925. I have read it with great
interest and delight.

Assuring you of my esteem and good will,
I am,
div1.closer:
Faithfully yours, E. A. Alderman
President.
